By maximizing the processes of extraction, refining, transport, storage, and distribution, enormous gains in efficiency and volume can come with the added value of reduced waste.

Far beyond simple networked computers that talk to networked appliances and personal information technologies lies the possibility of what is, more or less, a networked everything. Movement, consumption, creation, and development are all done by entities--living or not--that can be networked to create a seamlessly perfect execution of any function necessary in a society.

Data is typically thought of as unrelated individual elements of information that must be collated and analyzed by an outside source. By combining numbers theory and data architecture models (and given enormous computing power), random feeds of real-time data can learn to self-organize and self-define, generating theories and relationships without intervention.

Far beyond simple networked computers that talk to networked appliances and personal information technologies lies the possibility of what is, more or less, a networked everything. Movement, consumption, creation, and development are all done by entities--living or not--that can be networked to create a seamlessly perfect execution of any function necessary in a society.

Based on the ancient technologies of recombinant gene engineering, accelerated evolution is a pool of techniques that overall permit organisms to adapt and thrive at an very rapid pace. When applied to crops, it produces densely packed fields of disease- and pest-resistant plants that self-fertilize, adapt to intense climate conditions, and even taste good.

As better understanding of the technology behind Dust drives computing power close to infinity, there is almost no limit to the number of variables that can be included in an estimation -- and the accuracy of the associated predictions moves close to perfection. Careful manipulation of events, media, and key personalities can be done in order to always have, for instance, exceedingly favorable poll results.

As better understanding of the technology behind Dust drives computing power close to infinity, there is almost no limit to the number of variables that can be included in an estimation -- and the accuracy of the associated predictions moves close to perfection. Careful manipulation of events, media, and key personalities can be done in order to always have, for instance, exceedingly favorable poll results.

While many cultures believe that "money makes the world go 'round", in fact the meaning of the phrase varies wildly if the numerous meanings of 'money', world' and 'go' are studied in depth. In fact, the process of investing for maximum return and value creation requires an understanding that combines the most advanced financial mathematics with psychology, xenology, cosmology, and being really, really lucky.

Academics came up with a mouthful of words for this simple concept: researchers partnering with an advanced AI to improve their chances of success. These systems use a combination of living intuition, rapid calculation and deduction, Dust-enhanced networks, massively parallel search, and political intuition to maximize the outcome of research dollars invested.

Through careful management of labor and investment and in addition maintaining control over key resources, it is possible for a faction to achieve a situation in which it has competitive advantage in whatever market it chooses to focus on.

Part process, part attitude, and part infrastructure, Endless Development is a program that adds and develops skills from birth to death. Whether an individual, android, or machine, the idea of continuous learning and continuous evolution of skills and activities adds a powerful and productive boost to a society.

Creation of a major financial center on any given planet is a major project -- alien habitats, highly advanced communication infrastructures, specialized universities, and the highest quality shopping and dining are among the pre-requisites. To do this on a level that could turn a solar system into a galactic center of finance is a very rare achievement.

One of the great risks to Craver society is the lack of cohesion between broods from separate queens. While the ideal (applied universal pheromones) is not yet here, communication systems that transfer chemical signals in addition to information allow distributed fleets and ships to keep a unified purpose.

Between observation, study, game theory algorithms, spies, forecasting, and careful consideration of alternatives, almost every negotiation can be resolved in your favor. Highly dependent on the technical capacities of Dust to quantum-compute potential results in real time, few civilizations could imagine achieving this level of domination.

Between observation, study, game theory algorithms, spies, forecasting, and careful consideration of alternatives, almost every negotiation can be resolved in your favor. Highly dependent on the technical capacities of Dust to quantum-compute potential results in real time, few civilizations could imagine achieving this level of domination.

With a large enough portfolio of investments and sufficiently advanced systems, it is possible to guarantee a positive return. Based on computing systems powered largely by Dust, investments are likely to be net positive at least until the heat death of the universe. Beyond that point, contract re-negotiation is likely.

With a large enough portfolio of investments and sufficiently advanced systems, it is possible to guarantee a positive return. Based on computing systems powered largely by Dust, investments are likely to be net positive at least until the heat death of the universe. Beyond that point, contract re-negotiation is likely.

Given a fixed and guaranteed flow of positive income, elimination of waste, and Dust-enhanced systems to monitor manufacturing and logistics, society's most difficult challenge becomes consumption. Hoarding wealth is inefficient, yet only so many luxuries can be consumed. Decisions, decisions…

The desire of governments to unite diplomatically can only succeed if the populace follows. By instilling in the population a strong sense of unity and fraternity among diverse nations, a well-developed policy of information and infrastructure can yield great rewards.

The Automatons live on vast ships that orbit their chosen worlds. By upgrading their sophisticated system of satellites to be able to further automate and facilitate transport and communication between their ships. This gives these clockwork beings great advantages in production and economics.
High-isotope materials are prized for both their material capacities and their energy content. Manufacturing them in large quantities is key to making them economically viable.

Once heavier high-technology materials can be mass produced, the next critical step is to be able to shape and adapt them as desired. This requires advanced robotics, computing, and a great deal of energy.

A side benefit of the space program, highly advanced fabrics and ceramics are developed that also have practical usage for armor. Layered, compressed, or reactive, they make buildings and vehicles highly resistant.

A spin-off from planetary colonization technology, architecture and construction projects can be directly integrated into geographical features. This provides camouflage as well as increased protection.
Refining of artificially created elements and development of neutron-heavy versions of these elements provides high-mass materials. These have many military uses, both offensive and defensive.

One challenge to increased military capability on space vessels is the ability to provide sufficient energy to power advanced weaponry. High-Energy Batteries take advantage of new elements and composites to provide exactly this.
High nuclear mass materials that have been artificially created are not necessarily stable. The technology to contain and exploit them has practical applications.

After being used for industrial purposes and particularly energy generation, high-mass isotopes leave behind extremely dense spent metals whose properties are particularly interesting if you like to punch holes in things.
These are space-qualified versions of reactive armor, which has layers that are designed to explode when hit. This effect damages the incoming projectiles and nullifies the effects of shaped charges.
As technology improves, fusion systems have become reusable and even rechargeable thanks to superior containment capabilities and massive capacitance systems.
Leaps in materials and signaling sciences have resulted in fusion systems that can be contained in warheads of many sizes, nicknamed "pico-suns".

Manufacturing technology has advanced to the point where barrels and projectiles are perfect replicas of one another, down to an atomic level. Weapon power, precision, and reliability are all improved as a result.
New material discoveries and advanced machining techniques mean that hull alloys can be created of materials that reflect or disperse incoming beam weapons. Usually.
Even better than surviving a hit is to never be hit at all. Advances in remote sensing, electronics, and particle physics result in improved defensive systems to take out incoming attacks.

Starships must be immune to many different forces. By developing defensive systems that integrate numerous field types that affect both matter and anti-matter, survivability and longevity increase greatly.
One step better than surviving a hit is to never be hit at all. Advances in remote sensing, electronics, and particle physics result in improved defensive systems to take out incoming attacks.
As improved materials and energy science reduces the size of components, magnetically-propelled projectile weapons can be fabricated small enough to be carried by hand.
Hot, high-speed plasma beams are potentially devastating weapons. While they are difficult to use with the interference of a planetary atmosphere, in space they are quite effective.
Plasma is a high-energy highly ionized gas. Compressed by a powerful magnetic force, it could theoretically be used as a projectile. Science fact has now caught up with theory.
A necessary by-product of the rush to create plasma weapons was the necessity to create exceedingly powerful magnetic fields. In some cases, these fields can also have military roles.
Ablative defenses are designed to self-destruct in order to protect their cargo. For starships numerous components including metals, composite materials, fields, and reactive armor are used.
Ablative defenses are designed to self-destruct in order to protect their cargo. For starships numerous components including metals, composite materials, fields, and reactive armor are used.
By improving the technology of the plasma 'pinch' and preparing an energizable 'channel' between aggressor and target, these weapons increase the destructive power of plasma beams.
More advanced magnetics permit positrons, a form of anti-matter, to be contained in relatively small units.
With development of more powerful magnetics creating the possibility of harnessing plasma in ever-smaller units, science can create plasma fields -- like a shield system -- around very small units.
As a magnetic field of sufficient force can be used to contain plasma, numerous improved armor systems are being developed that include these exceedingly fields.
Traditional hull construction required that many plates be joined together. Improved metallurgy, however, now allows the frame of an entire ship to be cast as single, cohesive units.

As materials become smarter, construction of new colonies and new buildings can be done by 'evolving' existing structures. The resulting agglomeration is stronger, partially aware, and will defend itself.

As materials become smarter, construction of new colonies and new buildings can be done by 'evolving' existing structures. The resulting agglomeration is stronger, partially aware, and will defend itself.
Primarily by bringing energy generation down to a portable size, small vehicles or even augmented individuals can transport their own shield systems.
Radical steps in the understanding of particle physics have given scientists the ability to cause quantum entanglement between matter in different locations.
Radical steps in the understanding of particle physics have given scientists the ability to cause quantum entanglement between matter in different locations.

Leptons -- photons, electrons, and neutrinos -- are important but difficult to handle due to their lack of mass. Technology now exists to control the phases of decay between electron, muon, and tau leptons.
Mastery of quantum decay and entanglement means that matter can now be held in a form that is neither wave nor particle. These uncollapsed entities turn out to be in an unchanging phase of 'stasis'.
While plasma shielding requires a great deal of power to be effective, improvements that use the energy of enemy weapons to re-charge the fields creates shields that regenerate after impact.

The Automatons are not only tireless workers, but also cautious planners. Industrial output can be saved as undifferentiated parts, materials, and energy sources, ready to be used and converted when needed. In this case, stocked resources are converted into additional shielding capacity for their orbital ships, giving the system a major boost in defense.
Nonbaryonic particles -- from photons to neutrinos to dark matter -- make up most of the mass of the universe. Technology has finally advanced to the point where they can be harvested and used.
By controlling the decay of particles through the use of local stasis fields, new weapons systems have been created that manipulate all four primary energy sources at once.
Though the wave/particle duality of non-baryonic matter is still poorly understood, enough advances have been made that dark matter and dark energy can be manipulated to a certain extent.
Non-baryonic particles (like dark matter and dark energy) is pervasive throughout all matter of the universe. Certain ultradense metals, however, can create effective barriers to it.
Non-baryonic particles (like dark matter and dark energy) is pervasive throughout all matter of the universe. Certain ultradense metals, however, can create effective barriers to it.
Improved understanding of the quantum state of materials has resulted in the creation of certain metals that are unchanged by any known electromagnetic or gravitational force.
By taking advantage of new energy sources and specialized alloys, nonbaryonic particle generators can be made small enough that they are portable. Heavy, but portable.

Though its relative invisibility to ancient scientific measures made its true characteristics unknown, in fact dark energy has powerful effects for deflecting and lensing baryonic -- or 'normal' -- matter.

Though its relative invisibility to ancient scientific measures made its true characteristics unknown, in fact dark energy has powerful effects for deflecting and lensing baryonic -- or 'normal' -- matter.

Advanced knowledge of entropy and nonbaryonic systems has led to breakthroughs in the understanding of how any form of matter decays. The capability exists to prevent, for the foreseeable future, any alteration in the initial state of a given element of matter.

through processes as simple as oxidation and as complex as radioactive decay, naturally occurring materials break down over time. By ensuring materials are unchanging at a sub-atomic level, objects can be built that should endure for the foreseeable future.
Improved abilities to predict and manage the decay of dark matter and dark energy has resulted in containment fields that hold usually unstable materials together -- temporarily.
By acting on the forces and particles that hold atoms together, new forms of weaponry can create even larger explosions -- in space.
Mastery of nonbaryonic particles and leptons in particular have aided scientists in discovering and manipulating the most elusive force of all -- gravity.
The 'strong' nuclear force holds our baryonic universe together. By destabilizing quarks and cracking these building blocks, new weapons can be developed to crack open the toughest targets.
Yes Virginia, there *is* a graviton. By accelerating the breakdown of this fundamental particle, entropy itself can be used as a weapon.

Going a step beyond neutron capture, custom materials can be built from quarks directly rather than from protons and neutrons. These new materials, dubbed 'nucleals', have some fascinating applications.

Going a step beyond neutron capture, custom materials can be built from quarks directly rather than from protons and neutrons. These new materials, dubbed 'nucleals', have some fascinating applications.

The phenomena called 'lensing' was first attributed to the affects of gravity on photons. However, if the right materials and enough energy is used, almost any particle can be 'lensed away' from an object.

The phenomena called 'lensing' was first attributed to the affects of gravity on photons. However, if the right materials and enough energy is used, even lightweight neutrinos can be 'lensed' and channeled for various industrial uses.
One of the more entertaining applications of advanced thermodynamics, Controlled Entropy is a method to locally accelerate the decay of matter into random, disorganized energy and atoms.
By developing materials with properties that are naturally entropy-resistant, military systems can be built that have a natural tendency to remain stable regardless of changes in energy.
To a certain extent the Holy Grail of materials science, A-Entropic Materials can be used to create objects that should remain unchanged until the heat death of the universe.

Key to the Hissho warrior culture is the notion of Learning - Mastery - Imparting. Like their soldiers, their ships are also equipped with integrated systems that study the effects of the ship's experience and share it with other vessels within communication range.
A nickname for hyper-dense deuterium, this is an exceedingly heavy hydrogen isotope that is used to power n-way fusion plants.
This recently discovered isotope of titanium is the heaviest known form of the element. Its properties make it extremely valuable in both electronics and aeronautics.
Improved magnetic field control permits harvesting of the antiparticles that can be captured in specific parts of planetary magnetic fields; These provide an excellent source of renewable energy.
An exceedingly dense and heavy form of iron formed by the gravitational pressure found near planetary cores, this metal is highly valuable for numerous industrial uses.
Discovered as a byproduct of the nuclear fusion process within a star, the properties of this orange metal make it excellent for anything that must put up with extreme conditions.

Nicknamed for the common mineral found in hydrothermal veins, this Siderite is found near veins of extreme dark energy activity. Previously difficult to identify and extract, this ultra-hard substance can now be exploited.
Currently the strongest material tested, Adamantian is mined from asteroids and planetoids that passed in close proximity to a sun.
A material that exists in phases between matter, anti-matter, and alternate universes, quadrinix has the highest energy density of any known and containable substance.
While the energy density of dark energy may not be as high as other sources, its ready availability in the universe makes it by far the most practical source.
Neutronium is formed at the crust of neutron stars, whose gravitational pull is so strong it compacts the material into a substance ten billion times stronger than steel.

It is inevitable the diversity of planets would also create a diversity of biological life. Strange beasts, with even stranger abilities, can be found in the many anonymous planets of the galaxy. Whether as pets, products, food, or means of production, the strange species of the galaxy have enormous value.

In planets, planetoids, asteroids, collapsed stars, and other fragments of matter is found one of the great resources of the universe--previously unknown gems and minerals. Through exploration and the advancement of science, they can be mined, refined, and shaped into objects of untold wealth.

Beyond the home world of any species lie the infinite reaches of space with their equally infinite diversity of molecules. Whether harmless or lethal, beneficial or inert, the many complex molecular chains of the galaxy create substances of great power--and great value.

Even before advanced forms of mining or biochemistry exist to take advantage of the resources available among the stars, great wealth can be found in the artifacts of long-lost civilizations. Once the artifacts -- which are occasionally active, even dangerous -- have been isolated and scanned, they can be analyzed, extracted, and safely transported--regardless of the laws.
Named for the star system where the organization was first created, an agreement is reached between producers to allow monopoly pricing on trade goods.

Behind closed doors, a super-cartel of price fixing groups is created in order to leverage information, exploitation, and scarcity across all luxury goods. The resulting demand and price control is an efficient money machine.
A nickname for colonization craft, the role of 'seed' ships is to sow new outposts across the habitable worlds that are discovered.

A great obstacle to the development of increasingly small integrated circuits is that at small enough chip scales, quantum particle and field effects interfere with the intended operations of the transistors. By using quantum damping technology, however, these parasitic effects can be bled off so the circuits perform as intended at less than 5 nano-meter scales.

Electricity remains the critical element of all ship systems -- command, control, maneuvering, life support, machinery, etc. The use of superconducting transmission systems and leakless batteries ensures that this critical resource flows without loss or degradation, lessening the requirements for wiring, storage, and generation.

Much discussed and long-researched, it is finally here. Thousands if not millions of parallel "qubits" can be strung together into computing systems that are small enough to be invisible to the naked eye, yet powerful enough to handle the most advanced and complicated operations.

All things are made of chains and structures based on elements from the periodic table. With energy production essentially 'free' and powerful containment fields, it is now far simpler and cheaper to simply purchase in bulk whatever elements are needed in the cheapest form they can be obtained, then build them into whatever form or compound is needed on the trip. Requirements for special storage and complicated shipping and packaging are now a thing of the past.

The ability to solve three-dimensional volume relationships in real time for any number of elements--impossible without neural computational analysis--provides a ship with real-time optimized storage layouts, maximizing the use of internal space.

This drive takes advantage of the enormous gravitational mass of cosmic strings. Arrays of magnet coils in the ship create a magnetic field that generates powerful thrust due to the opposing magnetic field of the superconducting string. Cosmic strings provide the paths that link this star system to other nearby systems.
As understanding of electromagnetic forces improves, higher energy magnetic coils and more powerful control systems are used to increase the speed of the basic string induction drive.

An improvement on the basic magnetic induction systems, this advanced form of the drive manipulates gravitons to generate the fields that drive the ship along the path of the cosmic string. The resulting engines are both faster and smaller than the relatively clunky magnetic systems.

With materials, computing, and particle physics knowledge on par with the Endless the intelligent species of the galaxy are capable of creating starship engines that travel at speeds that can only be described as reckless.

Passing through the entrance to a wormhole subjects a starship to incredible forces of gravity and powerful blasts of radiation. Denser materials, shielding, and advanced hull construction permit a vessel to take this risk at less than 100% fatality rates.

Measurements and analyses done by ships traversing wormholes have revealed an unexpected discovery. In fact, in the extra-dimensional space between the entry and exit of a wormhole exists a sort of 'hyperspace' within which all currently mapped wormholes are connected. This can be exploited to permit a vessel to enter a wormhole and exit through any other wormhole whose coordinates are known.

The math is not easy, but it is possible to create a warp 'bubble' around a starship, and accelerate it by compressing space-time in front of the bubble while expanding space-time behind. Though there are difficulties in navigation and maneuvering, it provides a way to move independently between stars.

Initial successes with the warp field engine system have spurred research and engineering. The speed and maneuverability of the ships have improved, and much of the time the crew is now able to see where they are going.

Simple advances in energy generation have improved the engine's ability to compress and expand space-time. The resulting increase in speed is appreciated, and higher engine efficiency also means that greater distances can now be traveled.
The first step in making trade, research, war or peace, communications with alien species must be studied and brought to a higher level than dropping prepositions and speaking more loudly.

A natural next step in opening diplomatic and trade relations is to ensure that traveling members of any species will be welcomed in a way that is healthy and secure for all parties -- from hygiene to cultural preferences to body armor.

Such a simple thing among members of the same species, and so complex with aliens… trading financial and scientific data requires exhaustive negotiations and complex treaties and explanations covering data formats, measurement standards, time standards, and explanations of exactly what the clause "Act of God" means.

A particularity of Pilgrim society, missions of conversion or explanation to alien societies are important for their long-term goals. In order to be seen as seekers and guides, rather than as weirdos who you hide from when they knock on the door, Pilgrims must understand the do's and don't's of alien cultures. Beyond etiquette and propriety, these centers help understand fears, taboos, and prejudices.

For long-term exchanges to be effective between alien species, an enormous amount of infrastructure work must be done. Food supplies, housing, safe/unsafe chemicals, transportation systems, and other topics must be dealt with so that the allies can freely move in each others' territories.

A particularity of Pilgrim society, missions of conversion or explanation to alien societies are important for their long-term goals. In order to be seen as seekers and guides, rather than as weirdos who you hide from when they knock on the door, Pilgrims must understand the do's and don't's of alien cultures. Beyond etiquette and propriety, these centers help understand fears, taboos, and prejudices.

Arguably the most challenging effort in dealing with alien societies is the ability to understand and model their intellectual systems. The ability to gauge, predict, and influence their reaction to political and economic issues provides a handsome return, when it works.

Arguably the most challenging effort in dealing with alien societies is the ability to understand and model their deepest fears and desires. Channeling and understanding these drivers of personality, the ability of the Amoeba to gauge, predict, and influence others provides a handsome bonus.

The most difficult part of dealing with aliens can often be convincing one's own citizens that it is in their best interest to either be in an alliance or be at war. It is a long-term process of education, information, and sometimes a bit of pressure.

It is a long struggle, but the ability to be seen by multiple alien nations as a reliable and predictable partner reaps innumerable benefits. Whether in diplomacy, trade, or research, the role of a trusted partner is precious and prized.

"First among aliens" is a capability with many levels of risk and responsibility. It means being the negotiator of choice in the event of conflict, the most trusted partner in business, the most influential element in a political situation. To achieve this status in a group of wildly disparate nations requires knowledge, empathy, communication, and patience at a level that most leaders cannot conceive of.
A first step in handling large-scale maneuvers and multiple vessels, the use of sensors and systems to coordinate fleet movement provides a tactical advantage.
Beyond simple good management, advanced Command, Control, and Communications systems are necessary to be able to run increasingly complex fleet affairs.
By imposing their hive-style communications on highly advanced quantum states, the leaders of an extended hive can control more directly the actions and attitudes of their citizens.
To the classic elements of C3 is added Computing; the complex calculations needed to handle weapons and trajectories in four-dimensional warfare is, as they say, a non-trivial task.

Command, Control, Communications, Computing, and… C, the speed of light. The final "c" to be integrated into advanced battle systems, the ability to react to masses moving at a measurable percentage of "c" is the final key to handling large fleet maneuvers using advanced technologies.

A first step in maximizing lessons from both success and failure is a detailed post-op review of what happened and why. By systematizing this process and exploiting all known information technologies to do so, each learning experience becomes far more beneficial.

A first step in maximizing lessons from both success and failure is a detailed post-op review of what happened and why. By systematizing this process and exploiting all known information technologies to do so, each learning experience becomes far more beneficial.

The advances in neuroscience and systems science have led to the partial inclusion of bioengineered implants for those leaders who request it. The long-term effects are unknown, but in the short term the rapidity with which they learn and adapt is astounding.

While Personnel departments have long specialized in handling the complexities and vagaries of individuals from one species, the addition of other species to the work/life mix requires new and advanced processes and policies.

Beyond simple management of larger teams is the challenge of managing larger teams of diverse species. It requires the greatest leaders -- or despots -- to be able to present a shared vision and drive a disparate team toward shared goals.

Beyond simple management of larger teams is the challenge of managing larger teams of diverse species. The Horatio often excel at this for precisely the wrong reasons; they tend to integrate aliens into their culture, and move forward as a unified whole.

You can now populate stars far from your starting constellation. However, to do this will require effort at all levels of the society. By creating an official program and stressing the need to sacrifice small comforts in service of a larger cause, some of the discontent caused by colonization can be minimzed.

Living in the orbitals and bases around gas giants is exceedingly stressful. Lack of privacy, claustrophobia, homesickness, and numerous shortages combine to make life difficult. This counseling program -- a mixture of independent study, individual sessions, psychotherapy, and medication -- greatly reduces stress levels. These principles are then applied to the general population, helping improve the attitudes towards space colonization.

Networking and biotech are capable of placing any living being in a largely virtual reality. While the body and its needs cannot be ignored, much of what is play, work, and socialization can be done while tied to a network interface. As the effects of overcrowding, congestion, and noise are suddenly removed from daily life, Approval ratings increase notably.

Complex anti-matter and dark matter emanations have been shown to potentially have interesting side effects on brainwaves and nervous systems. Dark radiation transmission, on certain frequencies and at certain rhythms, can apparently soothe and calm agitated systems. While it is perhaps not kind or ethical to manipulate populations this way, it is certainly efficient...

At Consciousness Detachment Centers, known as 'uplift factories', the average citizen can have their mind uploaded. For all the mathematical complexity of it, and in spite of the incredibly advanced neuroscience and biology required, the end result seems deceptively ordinary. A few psychoactive drugs, a bit of meditation, and suddenly you are part of the network, a living embodiment of organized energy. The world, the galaxy, and the universe await you. An equal to the Endless, it is not unlikely that you will meet them, out there, for the science of your faction is almost on par with theirs.

The dream of immortality is near, via the process of separating mind and body. The body is put into cryogenic sleep, and the mind lives on. But before we can speak of an immortal mind, the networks on which the mind travels must guarantee 0% failure rates for thousands of years.

Profit, or "rent" as the economists call it, is generally only available through careful investment and oversight. Once the creation of wealth has become automated, cash will be forever available for consumption or investment -- a useful fact for those pursuing immortality.

One of the final steps to attaining a virtualized life form is the need to be able to communicate and travel wherever one wishes -- immortality on a chip locked in a closet is not the goal. To achieve this, the transport and communication systems that link the galaxy must be built from materials that will, quite simply, last forever.
Stripped of electrons and packed into a dense mass, ions of high-periodicity elements can create explosive warheads that detonate with a very pleasing 'bang!'

Many materials can be found or fabricated whose usefulness as weapons is counter-balanced by their tendency to explode unpredictably. With sufficiently hard cases and strong field containment, however, unstable isotopes can be built into effective warheads.

Fusion reactors, powered by the same reaction that lights the stars, are a powerful source of energy and when miniaturized can form devastatingly effective missiles. The warheads may be the size of a small house, but they are still highly effective.

Highly ionized and high-energy gases are difficult to contain. With advances in shielding and field technology that permits this, plasma warheads are now available to more than a few mad and partially suicidal researchers.
Various forms of anti-matter have been either predicted or known for ages. To make a practical weapon, however, required powerful and portable magnetic containment fields.
If the goal of a weapon is to destroy matter, a very practical way is to accelerate the decay of standard baryonic matter into its sub-atomic components. Loud and dangerous, but practical.
If the goal of a weapon is to destroy matter, a very practical way is to accelerate the decay of standard baryonic matter into its sub-atomic components. Loud and dangerous, but practical.

Though Weakly Interactive Massive Particles were difficult to detect and existed primarily in theory, their gravitational effect was measurable. Exploiting their effect on gravity and mass results in very effective torpedoes.
The use of Dark Matter and Dark Energy as weaponry is not a simple thing; containing them and triggering their effects requires science bordering on witchcraft.

A side result of experimenting with non-baryonic particles was the discovery that they could be used to locally accelerate entropy. Fortunately, the research lab sent out sufficient documentation before the tests that another lab was able to reproduce the effects AND survive the experiment.
By using materials with heavy nuclei, chaff can be created that not only confuses targeting systems but also forms a lethal screen.
A side product of developing powerful, portable fields for isotope containment is the capacity to use these fields to locally improve ship defenses.
More plasma than pellet, hull-mounted fusion reactors can generate controlled bursts of fusion energy to destroy incoming missiles.

Sufficiently energized plasma can create a powerful physical shield against incoming threats. Insufficiently energized plasma, on the other hand, provides the defensive capacity of wet tissue paper. Be warned.

Technology required to contain anti-matter can also be used to compress normal matter to the point where new matrices and structures are formed. This 'superdense' metal is effective even against some forms of anti-matter weaponry.

Some of the most perplexing particles in physics -- electrons, gravitons, neutrinos -- are leptons. Learning to interfere with the passage of these ubiquitous particles results in shield capacities far beyond normal systems.

A form of ablative armor that targets the use of anti-matter and non-baryonic weapons, the mechanism of Implosive Shielding is poorly understood, but effective. There is some concern that it causes apocalyptic anti-matter collisions in parallel universes, but this for the time being shall remain only theory.

The penetrative capacity of Dark Matter is difficult to counter-act. Only anti-fields driven by non-baryonic fusion that locally collapse the reality of time/space seem to work. Scientists are unsure how or why, but the engineers don't care.
The Laws of Physics seem to be broken, one by one, in the name of progress. The last to go is thermodynamics' third, for now fields can be created that locally defy the forces of entropy.
An inevitable first step in developing functional space-borne beam weapons, the good old laser is well-known, reliable, and great in a vacuum.
A higher-energy form of the standard laser weapon, Synchrotron Lasers are widely available thanks to the creation of cheap and portable particle accelerators.
High energy electromagnetic fields are used to "pinch" the plasma generated by controlled fusion reactors. The resulting beam is more than happy to put holes in anything it comes across.
This laser-induced plasma channel weapon has the additional advantage of hitting the target with a strong electromagnetic field pulse.

By applying controlled quantum decoherence to a target, the quantum state of the material is altered, causing it to spontaneously release heat and dissolve. The mathematics required to align and target require non-existent anti-variables in quantum superposed arrays; working on the research teams requires regular sanity checks.
Ubiquitous and powerful, Dark Energy can be harnessed and targeted by sufficiently advanced science and technology.
By bombarding a target with beams of variously charged forms of baryonic and non-baryonic particles, fundamental nanofissures in the structure of reality can be created.

Gluons, the fundamental quarks that hold together atoms, can be manipulated and interfered with. By dissolving their bonds, molecules in a target can be turned into sub-quantum particles with an enormous release of energy.
Highly polished advanced alloys are used to deflect and reflect the energies from incoming lasers.
By detecting the phase and frequency of particles, a system of active mirrors can negate much of the energy of incoming beam weapons.
Plasma, shaped and stabilized by a high-energy magnetic field, can act as a very resistant barrier.
This is an improved used of plasma for ship defense, in which it is shaped into charges and using it to deflect and dissipate incoming beams.
By un-entangling particles at the quantum level and controlling their oscillations, beam weapons can be rendered harmless enough to be absorbed by the ships' standard hull.
Exploiting a system that matches incoming charged beams with oppositely charged particles, much of the offensive energy is effectively dissipated.
Exploiting the networking and field effects of Dust, energy fields can be created around a vessel that transform incoming phased particles -- regardless of their form -- into a dispersed cloud.

Predictive algorithms and quantum entanglement forecasting -- not possible without a deep understanding of Dust and fairly large stocks of it -- allow counter-active waves to nullify the effects of particle weapons.
Serving as reliable weapons since the time of sticks and rocks, these are nothing more than hard materials fired at high velocity.
By using advanced fabrication systems, projectiles of high-isotope materials can be casted and contained effectively.
Under the effects of certain high-energy fields, traditional metal crystals re-align into denser structures. These result in projectiles with better penetration.

The advantage of using newer machining systems that rely on field and magnetic effects is that projectiles can be created that are perfect copies of each other down to the microscopic level. This provides great advantages in weapon system efficiency.
An excellent way to put holes in almost anything, this version of the Railgun drives plasma-shielded slugs into enemy vessels.
Combining effects of kinetic impact with EMP pulses, highly ionized Plasma Slugs are an improvement in plasma railgun technology.

A form of improved railgun projectile, the Hissho Talon Slugs are an excellent close-range weapon based on technology developed by an advanced weapons laboratory. In keeping with tradition, each box is anointed with the blood of a sacrifice.
These slugs are created from relatively unstable nonbaryonic matter farmed from the depths of space. Held in form by charged shields, they decompose explosively upon impact.

Though Dark Matter is notable for its ability to pass unnoticed through standard materials, by manipulating its quantum components it can be used for kinetics that pass through armor, then materialize and damage the interior of an enemy vessel.
Nicknamed for a quark whose behavior is now standard and predictable, these highly specific warheads are designed to break apart the most fundamental bonds of matter.

The densest known form of matter is found just inside the event horizon of Active Galactic Nuclei. Though harvesting this matter requires incomprehensibly advanced technology, the resultant kinetics are essentially unstoppable.
A simple and highly effective defense, multiple layers of reflective, deflective, and absorptive armors stops or slows basic enemy projectiles.
By using denser materials, hull integrity and armor resistance to kinetics are improved. These materials are difficult to machine, but highly effective.
Armor that is derived from depleted high-isotope materials increases the density and greatly improves impenetrability of ship hulls.

Sufficiently advanced machining systems permit the creation of armor that is aligned and integrated at the atomic level. Combined with improved materials, this gives a noticeable advantage to ship defenses.
The technology that drives railguns is based on magnetic fields and systems combined with plasma-based arms and fields. These can also be combined into improved defensive systems.
An improvement on basic plasma shields, this is a denser version of the fields that makes projectile penetration more difficult.

A sophisticated component added to ship shielding, these shields are an advancement of the ablative idea, but in this case a projectile's energy is reconverted to matter based on the mass-energy equivalence.
Using the gravity effects of dark matter, new deflector technology increases the quality of kinetic deflectors.

A first attempt at enforcing the stability of over-stressed materials at a quantum level, this armor was nicknamed for a form of quark as much as for the hope that the crew of the vessel will have a charmed life.
A combination of materials, fields, and the use of gravity effects, this is the best technology that science can conceive for improving kinetic defenses.

An initial application of advanced technology to standard armor, this basic form of ship defense tries to determine the type and angle of incoming attacks, then orients and charges itself accordingly.

While the first generations of starship armament were similar to planetary versions, newer offensive arms require advanced armors. Reactive armor systems have shown to be useful against recent kinetic and missile weapons.
The advent of focused energy 'beam' weapons has changed the requirements for starship armor. Highly reflective armor which can deflect or disperse these beams is one solution.
The advent of focused energy 'beam' weapons has changed the requirements for starship armor. Highly reflective armor which can deflect or disperse these beams is one solution.
With the advent of plasma weapons, composite armor systems for starships armors with ablative characteristics have become highly practical.
This specialized armor system generates powerful magnetic pulses to deflect and destroy incoming attacks.
Requiring enormous amounts of energy, this shielding system surrounds the ship with a near-impenetrable barrier of dense, ionized gas.
By using exceedingly dense materials (generally affected by planetary cores or stars) armor plating can be created that is difficult to damage.
By controlling the effects of graviton particles, incoming ordinance can be deflected or destroyed.
A highly advanced armor system, Defensive Lensing uses gravity fields and gravitons to make a ship exceedingly difficult to hit.
By improving basic couplings in motor systems to handle excessive power loads, energy consumption in a ship can be greatly increased.
Increasing the power and frequency of magnetics permits greater energy generation and utilization.
This is not your grandfather's fusion reactor. N-way Fusion occurring within highly compressed containment fields can only be described as 'extreme.'
Using the ubiquitous and powerful streams of gravitons, nonbaryonic particle decay provides vast quantities of dangerous but efficient energy.
A first step in exploiting the most prevalent particle in the universe, this power technology does basic capture and fusion of neutrino particles.
Advanced neutrino capture and decay systems are the ultimate goal for creation of inexpensive and ubiquitous power supplies.
Ship-to-ground projectiles require highly specialized machining as they need to resist heat, friction, and wind.
As materials science allows ever more powerful charges, payloads, and barrels, artillery is developed that can fire space-to-surface.
Individual assault troops, whether living or robotic, need to be able to survive long enough to recon, analyze, decide, and act.
Individual assault troops, whether living or robotic, need to be able to survive long enough to recon, analyze, decide, and act.

Many delicate components are required to get assault systems from space to a planet (guidance, maneuvering, landing, deployment). By 'hardening' these different elements, planetary invasion is greatly simplified.

The most powerful weapons attempt to break apart targets at the quantum level. By stabilizing the most fundamental bonds of a hull, the survivability of space vessels and drop ships is greatly improved.

The most powerful weapons attempt to break apart targets at the quantum level. By stabilizing the most fundamental bonds of a hull, the survivability of space vessels and drop ships is greatly improved.
Initial advances in string induction drives have been followed up by a number of successful voyages. Lessons from these first experiences have resulted in improved engine technology.

Increased knowledge of particle behavior and containment fields has led to a handful of improvements in energy technology that make starship engines faster and more efficient. Both individual ships and fleets benefit from this advance.
By coupling onboard navigation systems with locators based in your systems, engine speed is not merely increased when traveling, but increased even more when returning to a friendly colonized system.

The use of quantum devices throughout drive and navigation hardware has resulted in unthinkable improvements in ship speed. As ship components, materials, and systems interact at the speed of light, engine speed and efficiency approach their theoretical maximum.
Requiring powerful energy sources, vast computing power, and massive detection systems, basic sensor modules can be fit into a ship -- but barely.
Using advanced filtering algorithms and a lot of really good guessing, sensors can be improved to identify sentient brainwaves and approximate their location.
Through the use of Dust-augmented signal analysis, an enormous range of different forms of radiation can be rapidly captured and analyzed, yielding significant improvements in scouting and detection.
They're more than that (of course), but the basic robotic systems used to repair ship damage appear to be little more than sophisticated mobile toolboxes.
While miniaturization is not yet where it could be, advances in robotic brains have made in-ship repair systems faster, smarter, more flexible, and better able to exploit a ship's limited resources.

Ship structural technology has advanced to the point where repair materials can be built into the hulls. Partially self-aware and networked, this 'Adaptive Glue' reacts and evolves to repair damage as it happens.

Advanced intelligent materials permit the fundamental structure of a ship to think and adapt, almost as if it was the skeleton of a living being. As long as there is energy, the ship will be able to self-repair.

With hexaferrum providing equivalent stability for less volume, improved simulations that better predict the effects of cargo mass and space on FTL ships resulted in the ability to reduce materials, costs, and safety margins in order to increase ship tonnage.
With Dust-enhanced, reactive storage systems becoming a standard on ships, more weight can be brought on board a ship thanks to these adaptive real-time cargo systems.
Surprise! That large, flat, poorly defended area conveniently located near a number of major metropolitan areas is actually the heart of a large, dense, and heavily armed bunker system.
By digging deep and using layers of armor that are by turns hardened, absorptive, and ablative, bunkers can be created that are considered to be almost uncrackable.

The value of a highly developed planet is in its research and industry. By weaving defensive systems into the fabric of daily life and urban infrastructure and creating independent and self-sufficient communities, conquest of a planet becomes far more difficult.
An ideal defensive weapon that is difficult to detect, these firearms cause contained matter/anti-matter explosions in their targets.

The clockwork Automatons are capable of stacking unused industrial power and capacity, holding it in storage in case of crisis. By converting that capacity into large shield systems, they gain a great bonus to system defense.

Partial control over local concentrations of dark matter (a high-gravity substance) allows defenses to improve their chances to avert or destroy incoming attacks. A side benefit is that the inhabitants can also rapidly move or pulverize rubble in the aftermath of a war.

A series of massive antenna dishes are installed, creating a network of receptors for signals beamed from space. In this case, they can be used to transfer energy -- for instance in microware form -- from orbiting ships to the surface, aiding in the process of post-invasion reconstruction.

While hulls and weapon systems are most visible, the guts of the ship that hold things together are equally, if not more, important. Improved ribs, bulkheads, decking, and maintenance systems cause a huge jump in the strength and survivability of a ship.

Due to the irregular shapes of starships, it is often difficult to project and maintain shields without creating points where shields are weak or where too many overlap and waste energy. Advanced systems that guarantee perfect ship shielding avoid both these issues.

A technology that allows hulls to be 'cast' or 'woven' more than bolted together, monohulls are ships whose hulls are multiple layers of single sheets of long molecule chains, making them resistant and durable.

One of the goals of ship design, ships whose hulls are chemically, magnetically, thermodynamically, and gravitationally inert means that they react to almost nothing and are incredibly difficult to damage.

The most powerful hull size, this ship class can carry up to $Tonnage $TonnageSymbol of weapons, defenses, armor, and special modules.
A very efficient cost/tonnage ratio, this ship class can carry $Tonnage $TonnageSymbol of weapons, defenses, armor, and special modules.
The least expensive ships to build, this ship class can carry $Tonnage $TonnageSymbol of weapons, defenses, armor, and special modules.

Leaving their system by choice or by obligation, the Pilgrim society has prepared a wondrous traveling vessel. Should it survive the rigors of the journey, the ship will be used to recreate the lost home, improvement for improvement, in a new system. True to its name, this great vessel of the Pilgrims will continue its quest across the galaxy.
